project1.title: Local Weather
project1.description: After registration and sign-in, this app enables the user to retrieve current weather as well as 3- and 5-day forecasts by entering a 5-digit zip code. Users can also save forecast details to the favorites collection and mark them 'Scary' if weather event is scary.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX and JSON, jQuery, Task Automation with Grunt, Bootstrap 3, Firebase

project2.title: Movie Maker
project2.description: Movie Maker accepts a budget amount from the user, then allows for selection of various elements necessary in order to make a movie. If the user makes at least one selection from each category and does not exceed the total budget, then (s)he can make the movie. If the user goes over budget or does not select from each category, (s)he cannot make the movie.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Browserify, Grunt, Bootstrap 3, task automation

project3.title: Melapix
project3.description: Melapix is a high resolution stock photo site containing images featuring people of color. Standard users of this application are able to search, view and save images to their collection for later usage. Users with a seller (photographer) account are able to view, edit and delete their images, as well as see data displaying their images that have been saved by other users.
project3.technologiesUsed: React, React Router Dom, React-Bootstrap (Bootstrap 3), HTMl, JavaScript/JSX, Sass, Firebase, Photoshop CC
